description: Day 1 onboarding documentation content for workspace simulation

welcome.title: Welcome to your first day!
welcome.description: Before you meet the team, take 5-10 minutes to read through these onboarding docs. You'll learn what NovaPay does and what you'll be working on this week.

tldr.text: Merchant Dashboard helps small business owners track their money. You'll be fixing a timezone bug in the Transactions page.

content.description: **Merchant Dashboard** is the admin panel where NovaPay's business customers manage their payment operations. Think of it as their "mission control" for money.

features.name: Transactions
features.description: View all customer payments, refunds, and chargebacks in real-time

features.name: Payouts
features.description: See when money hits their bank account (usually every 2 business days)

features.name: Settings
features.description: Update bank details, business info, and notification preferences

persona.name: Maria
persona.title: Coffee Shop Owner
persona.description: Maria runs "Bean There" in Austin, TX. Every morning she checks her dashboard to see yesterday's sales, verify tips were processed correctly, and confirm her weekly payout is on schedule.

workflow.title: Maria's Daily Workflow:
steps: Opens dashboard, checks total sales from yesterday
Filters transactions by payment type (card vs cash)
Checks if Friday's payout arrived in her bank
Downloads weekly report for her accountant

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Maria is in Austin (CST) but transactions show in UTC. A sale at 8pm Monday shows as 2am Tuesday - confusing her daily reconciliation!

content.description: Every team has its own rhythm. Here's how we work together at NovaPay.

norms.title: Daily Standup at 10am
norms.description: Quick 15-min sync. Share what you did, what you're doing, and any blockers.

norms.title: Ask Early, Ask Often
norms.description: Stuck for more than 15 minutes? Reach out. No question is too small.

norms.title: Reviews = Learning
norms.description: Code review feedback is about the code, not about you. It's how we all improve.

norms.title: Document As You Go
norms.description: Comments and READMEs save future headaches. Write for future-you.

codebase.title: Our Codebase:
codebase.description: Monorepo with client, server, and shared code

items.label: Commits
items.value: Clear, descriptive messages ("Fix timezone display in transactions")

items.label: PRs
items.value: Include what, why, and how to test
